data.author: Adolf Hitler
data.quote: Think Thousand times before taking a decision But -After taking decision never turn back even if you get Thousand difficulties!

data.author: Theodore Roosevelt
data.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

data.author: Walt Disney
data.quote: The Way Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.

data.author: Vince Lombardi
data.quote: It's Not Whether You Get Knocked Down, It's Whether You Get Up.

data.author: Rob Siltanen
data.quote: People Who Are Crazy Enough To Think They Can Change The World, Are The Ones Who Do.

data.author: Dr. Henry Link
data.quote: We Generate Fears While We Sit. We Overcome Them By Action.

data.author: Theodore Roosevelt
data.quote: Do What You Can With All You Have, Wherever You Are.

data.author: Robert H. Schuller
data.quote: Today's Accomplishments Were Yesterday's Impossibilities.

data.author: Abraham Lincoln
data.quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.

data.author: Benjamin Franklin
data.quote: You may delay, but time will not.

data.author: Mahatma Gandhi
data.quote: Take care of this moment.

data.author: Napoleon Hill
data.quote: Every adversity, every failure, every heartbreak, carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit.

data.author: Nelson Mandela
data.quote: I never lose. I either win or learn.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.quote: No matter how many mistakes you make or how slow you progress, you are still way ahead of everyone who isn't trying

data.author: Che Guevara
data.quote: Be realistic, demand the impossible!

data.author: plato
data.quote: A good decision is based on knowledge and not on numbers.

data.author: Ernest Hemingway
data.quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterwards, some are strong at the broken places

data.author: Harry Main
data.quote: If you believe you can do it, go out there and do it, because that is the only way you are gonna get it!

data.author: anonymous
data.quote: Pick your life, don't let it pick you.

data.author: O Feltham
data.quote: The greatest results in life are usually attained by common sense and perseverance.
